data.text: @HelenSWriter @fionamsharp @NosyCrow That’s brilliant, thank you for telling me x
@Lucyvansmit @fionamsharp @NosyCrow And 'A Writer's Journal Workbook' is on my desk (where it also looks fab and is full of inspiring ideas!)
@NizRite I am loving your descriptions! I feel like I am on the mountain in lush green
@fionamsharp @NosyCrow @HelenSWriter Helen has impeccable taste! Just designing masterclass for @BelfastBookFest #WritingCommunity @Writers_Artists
@Lucyvansmit @NosyCrow @HelenSWriter She was buying your writers journal as it happens. https://t.co/38jA304DL5
@fionamsharp @NosyCrow @HelenSWriter Ooh, how intriguing! Her debut  is on my bedside table! Looks fab 📚🔥❤️
@Lucyvansmit @NosyCrow You definitely win. (Btw. @HelenSWriter & I were talking about you on Saturday!)
@Lucyvansmit @NosyCrow Sorry to hear about the Covid, but what a beautiful cover!
